title: Evaluation of effectiveness of an art-based museum intervention in reducing loneliness among older adults (ArtGran): a quasi-experimental study
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 230

Author(s): R. Mouriño-Ruiz, G. Serral, X. Continente, M.J. López, C. Lapena, R. Puigpinós-Riera
